text: Raffaele "Lele" Pinto (13 April 1945 – 8 December 2020) was an Italian rally driver. He won the 1974 Rally Portugal and the 1978 Rally Sanremo. His career lasted from 1973 to 1978. Pinto was born in Casnate, Italy. Pinto died on 8 December 2020 in Cecina, Tuscany at the age of 75.L'ultima curva di Raffaele Pinto, è morto il mito del rally innamorato dell'Elba ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian racecar drivers
title: Raffaele Pinto
